definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: You should sing according to my drumbeats, otherwise, there would be no order.
sentences.chinese: 打的鼓點開口，否則就沒有板眼了。

sentences.english: Joyful songs are still around our ears, cheerful drums are still in our hearts.
sentences.chinese: 愉悅的歌聲還回蕩在耳畔，快樂的鼓點還奏響在心中。

sentences.english: Don't ever let them hear drums and percussions.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓他們聽見鼓點和旋律。

sentences.english: And I also like the drum beat along with the dance feel to the song.
sentences.chinese: 並且我也非常喜歡跳着舞去感受整首歌的鼓點。

sentences.english: Lei Mingfeng dancing to drum beat made a conquest of Zhuo Luoyu for his pas.
sentences.chinese: 踩着鼓點跳舞的雷鳴鳳用他的舞蹈征服了卓洛宇。

sentences.english: I could feel my heart beating like drumbeats.
sentences.chinese: 我感到自己的心房急如鼓點。

sentences.english: Marching to the same beat, playing from the same drum.
sentences.chinese: 打著相同的節拍，踩着相同的鼓點。

sentences.english: Girls in holiday dress dance to the accompaniment of drums.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘們身着節日盛裝，應着木鼓鼓點翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: Its strong indigenous drums , the people easily accept the inheritance of characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 其鼓點本土性強，羣衆易接受傳承的特徵。

sentences.english: The drummer had a pretty tight snare sound, and nice articulation.
sentences.chinese: 這個鼓手的特點是軍鼓的聲音很緊，鼓點清晰。

sentences.english: Listen to music that has great drumming.
sentences.chinese: 聽那些有很棒的鼓點的音樂。

sentences.english: They are dressed in beautiful costumes, skipping back and forth to the rhythm of loud drums.
sentences.chinese: 他們身着漂亮的服裝，和着鼓點，扭來扭去。

definition: music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
(of sound) to never stop/to fall incessantly on the ear/to linger on
see 頓挫抑揚|顿挫抑扬[dun4 cuo4 yi4 yang2]
lit. as if weeping and complaining (idiom)/fig. mournful (music or singing)
to perform music/to play a tune
suona, Chinese shawm (oboe), used in festivals and processions or for military purposes/also written 鎖吶|锁呐/also called 喇叭[la3 ba5]
